decisions.name: Is_do_not_send_churn_email_checked
decisions.label: Is do not send churn email checked?

rules.name: Stage_Reversal_Entry_Criteria
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3) OR (3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 7 AND 8) OR (6 AND 7 AND 8)
rules.label: Stage Reversal Entry Criteria

formulas.name: ReverseACVMultiplier
TCSFirstSoldDate
UpdatedChildAccountType
formulas.expression: IF( AND( TEXT({!OpportunityId.Active_or_Inactive_Subsidiary__c}) = "Inactive Subsidiary (Out of Business)", OR( {!OpportunityId.Account.ParentId} <> "", {!OpportunityId.Parent_Account__c} <> "" ) ), "Acquired", IF( AND( TEXT({!OpportunityId.Active_or_Inactive_Subsidiary__c}) = "Active Subsidiary", OR( {!OpportunityId.Account.ParentId} <> "", {!OpportunityId.Parent_Account__c} <> "" ) ), "Subsidiary", IF( AND( {!OpportunityId.Account.ParentId} <> "", TEXT({!OpportunityId.Account.Child_Account_Type__c}) <> "" ), TEXT({!OpportunityId.Account.Child_Account_Type__c}), IF( {!OpportunityId.Account.ParentId} <> "", "Subsidiary", "" ) ) ) )

formulas.name: UpdatedContractingThroughParentAccount
formulas.expression: IF( TEXT({!OpportunityId.Secondary_Closed_Lost_Factors__c}) = "Acquired by another Navan Customer", TRUE, FALSE )

formulas.name: UpdatedTerritoryPatch
